title: Is Project Jinx...
body:
Just a Demacia Vice Villain that wasn't done for Garen and Lucian's release so they just threw her into the Project Line up?

I mean, I'm joking... but I'm sort of not.

replies.body:
lucian, garen, vi and cait were apparantly playable characters. darius was a mob boss.

https://i.imgur.com/JjlvTwe.jpg

but i see what you mean.
You know, I only hold that as further proof.
i want that vi skin so bad tho...
The real shame of that is the Darius one sounds the best.

> [{quoted}](name=Dead Anime Dad,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=o7AvKHGz,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2019-07-16T04:39:03.930+0000)
>
> The real shame of that is the Darius one sounds the best.

how dare you. garen and lucians are clearly the best.
Where as the splash for the garen one is great, his in game? Not so much, blame his skeleton having big honking pauldrons. Recalls are great though.

No because they would've been working on all those skins at the same time so they would've all been done at the same time.

These outcasts all appear to be different in terms of their augmentation, with Jinx being the least augmented of all, and I actually like that about them. All the other PROJECTs appear finished, but these guys? They're mean to be forgotten outsiders, some finished, some not. Some are broken/damaged. Some aren't even using PROJECT parts(the whiter/shinier/animal bits are likely from Programs).

Honestly, I can see where you're coming from. Its bizarre that she doesn't have the hallmark Neon "zing" that literally every PROJECT skin has. If you look at some previous skins:

https://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/landscape/vi-project.jpg

Vi has her obvious glowing fists of fury to contrast with the dark PROJECT setting.

https://i.redd.it/389s3z6gv8e21.jpg

PROJECT Vayne's crossbow really pops, and the whole splash is bathed in a neon glow. 

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/010/611/492/large/alex-flores-project-jhin-final-alexflores.jpg?1525321060

You've got Jhin, who is a little more subtle, but has a very distinct PROJECT-y helmet with the glowing symbol.

And just every other PROJECT splash besides: 

https://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/landscape/fiora-project.jpg
https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/001/185/088/large/joshua-brian-smith-project-lucian.jpg?1443929975
https://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/landscape/master-yi-project.jpg

(Even Yi, the "original", where they were still figuring out the aesthetic!) 

Then you look at Jinx, and she just doesn't have that same Neon accent at all. Sure, her color palette is using some neon purples, but its not providing any sort of light source. The splash as a whole is just far too bright, not even the others of this same batch are like that. Its just too bright for the gritty cyberpunk aesthetic. Demacian Vice has the neon color palettes without have the "glow" of PROJECT's accents against its dark colors, so I could see how one might think it would fit better with Demacian Vice. 

(BTW, I hope all these images show up, we'll see)
she looks like she belongs to that gamer zoe skin universe to be honest
Cyberpop, yeah. She honestly would probably fit that world a little bit better, a more positive spin on cyperpunk.
Nah dude I can actually see it.  She looks so bad in game and this doesn't convince me much either xD

My girl grew up and became a champion

 https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/1/1e/Chlo%C3%AB_Grace_Moretz_as_Hit-Girl_in_Kick_Ass.jpg
Title + An out of season April Fool's Joke.
This project skin line is really bad. In the past, I have thought that project was one of the stronger skin lines. I guess there has to be  a weak series at some point.
